numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Many students responded.
2. I thank all students who responded.
3. We received some catchy headlines.
4. The headline "The Opposing Futures in the Eyes of Different Generations" is by Helena.
5. Helena is a student of Pewaukee High School.
6. Pewaukee High School is in Wisconsin.
7. The headline "The Ages of Optimism" is by Zoe.
8. Zoe is in Wisconsin.
9. The headline "Generation Battle: Is the World Getting Better or Worse?" is by Taim.
10. Taim is a student of Gladeville Middle School.
11. Gladeville Middle School is in Mt. Juliet.
12. Mt. Juliet is in Tennessee.
13. You can continue to post responses.
14. Please check back by Friday, Feb. 11.
15. On Friday, Feb. 11, you can see the Reveal.
16. The Reveal has a link to the original New York Times article.
17. The Reveal has some questions about the graph.
18. The Reveal has a few Stat Nuggets.
19. Please visit our archive.
20. Our archive shows all graphs in this series.
21. The URL of the archive is tinyurl.com/NYTGraphs.
22. Please view our archives.
23. Our archives link to all past releases.
24. Our archives organize past releases by topic.
25. The URL of the topic index is tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTopicIndex.
26. Our archives organize past releases by graph type.
27. The URL of the graph type index is tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTypeIndex.
28. Our archives organize past releases by Stat Nugget.
29. The URL of the Stat Nugget index is tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsStatNuggetsIndex.
30. Sharon Hessney signs off.
31. Sharon Hessney is from Boston.
32. Sharon Hessney sees hope in the optimism of our students.
33. Dashiell Young-Saver signs off.
34. Dashiell Young-Saver is from San Antonio.
35. Dashiell Young-Saver has become more optimistic about the world.
36. Dashiell Young-Saver saw young people's optimism about the world.
